verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glory, glory, Hallelujah
Since I laid my burden down.(2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thank you Jesus, thank you Jesus,
Thank you Lord for saving me.(2)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus went to Calvary, and He died for me
That I lay my burden down. (2)'

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He rose up from the grave, that I might be saved
And I lay my burden down.(2)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
There'll be singing and rejoicing
When I lay my burden down.(2)
